com.facebook.react.modules.debug.interfaces

接口 DeveloperSettings

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DevInternalSettings

    public interface DeveloperSettings
    Provides access to React Native developers settings.

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • isFpsDebugEnabled

        boolean isFpsDebugEnabled()
        返回:
        whether an overlay showing current FPS should be shown.

      • isAnimationFpsDebugEnabled

        boolean isAnimationFpsDebugEnabled()
        返回:
        Whether debug information about transitions should be displayed.

      • isJSDevModeEnabled

        boolean isJSDevModeEnabled()
        返回:
        Whether dev mode should be enabled in JS bundles.

      • isJSMinifyEnabled

        boolean isJSMinifyEnabled()
        返回:
        Whether JS bundle should be minified.

      • isElementInspectorEnabled

        boolean isElementInspectorEnabled()
        返回:
        Whether element inspector is enabled.

      • isNuclideJSDebugEnabled

        boolean isNuclideJSDebugEnabled()
        返回:
        Whether Nuclide JS debugging is enabled.

      • isRemoteJSDebugEnabled

        boolean isRemoteJSDebugEnabled()
        返回:
        Whether remote JS debugging is enabled.

      • setRemoteJSDebugEnabled

        void setRemoteJSDebugEnabled(boolean remoteJSDebugEnabled)
        Enable/Disable remote JS debugging.

      • isStartSamplingProfilerOnInit

        boolean isStartSamplingProfilerOnInit()
        返回:
        Whether Start Sampling Profiler on App Start is enabled.

      • addMenuItem

        void addMenuItem(java.lang.String title)
        Add an item to the dev menu.
